CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The devices using the perylene-containing polymers showed higher short - circuit currents , and fill factors than the corresponding PFDTBT or PFD2TBT devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| perylene-containing polymers |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| perylene-containing polymers |
| PFDTBT |
| PFD2TBT |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names. "Devices using the perylene-containing polymers" refers to the devices made of perylene-containing polymers as a material. "Corresponding PFDTBT or PFD2TBT devices" refers to devices made of PFDTBT or PFD2TBT materials.

| Property Name |
| --- |

| of devices using perylene-containing polymers |

Explanation:
The original paragraph mentions "devices" and "corresponding" which do not clearly refer to material properties. However, in the context of the paragraph, it can be inferred that the devices are made of certain materials (perylene-containing polymers, PFDTBT, and PFD2TBT), so we keep "of devices using perylene-containing polymers" to maintain the context.
